text: As the U.S. gets closer to having a #COVID19 vaccine, some new and old concerns about #vaccine safety are emerging. Dr. Eric Yager, our vaccine expert, spoke to @Tech_Networks to debunk misinformation and explain why vaccines are safe. https://t.co/2vTlAQeZRz #LetsGetImmunizedNY https://t.co/kiBxq99eMb
